text.en:
You can target 1 monster you control that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set with "Guardian" in its original name; it can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Guardian" monster in your GY that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set to activate 1 of these effects;
● Add it to your hand.
● Add 1 card that mentions it from your GY to your hand.
You can only use each effect of "Principug" once per turn.
